title: Maple Sugar Time
brief_description: Maple sugar time in Eastern Canada, showing old-time methods, When snow softens and ice begins to break its time to load the traditional equipment on a sleigh and go off to the sugar bush. “Sugaring off” is a spring social event for the French-Canadian farmer, who celebrates with a party.
